description: FIJ/FUM/47/AS/17: Technical Assistance to Install Alternatives, Achieve Complinace and Phase out Methyl Bromide in Fiji

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
1. Phase-out of all Methyl Bromide use in Fiji by 2010 through:  
a) Facilitating transfer of existing alternatives from other countries and adapting to local context, 
b) Conducting training programs in alternatives for fumigators and other methyl bromide users, and 
c) Training Border security officials to ensure the control of methyl bromide at the borders. 

2. Development of policy package to ensure a successful, sustainable and orderly methyl bromide phase-out.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Fiji Methyl Bromide Project

title: FIJ/FUM/47/TAS/17: Fiji TAS for MeBR Project
